Package net.silthus.schat.messenger

Interface Messenger

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable
@OverrideOnly public interface Messenger extends AutoCloseable
Represents an object which dispatches PluginMessages.

  • Method Details

    • empty

      static Messenger empty()

    • registerMessageType

      void registerMessageType(Type type)
      Registers the given plugin message type for sending messages.

      Every PluginMessage that is sent must be registered or else an Messenger.UnsupportedMessageException will be thrown by sendPluginMessage(PluginMessage).

      Parameters:
      type - the type

    • registerTypeAdapter

      void registerTypeAdapter(Type type, Object adapter)

    • sendPluginMessage

      void sendPluginMessage(@NonNull @NonNull PluginMessage pluginMessage) throws Messenger.UnsupportedMessageException
      Performs the necessary action to dispatch the message using the means of the messenger.

      The underlying dispatch should always be made async.

      Parameters:
      pluginMessage - the outgoing message
      Throws:
      Messenger.UnsupportedMessageException

    • close

      default void close()
      Performs the necessary action to gracefully shut down the messenger.
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable
